about_the_game:
Saving a Fallen Universe

Every world has fallen, and the gods are gone. But before the gods lost to the great destroyer, they used every last bit of strength to create a safe haven called Elysium for a few heroes to keep up the fight.

So it’s up to you to avenge these fallen worlds and defeat the immortal god. But unlike any battle before, you’ll fight this one over and over only to lose.

You believe good will triumph over evil, that it will all turn out okay. It won’t. You may save some souls along the way, but no matter what you do, the Consumer of Worlds waits for you at the end.

1-4 Players

Fight your way through hordes of demon armies alone or in a group of up to 4 players! The difficulty scales by the party size to keep things challenging!

Customize Ability Colors

Don't like the color of your abilities? Customize the looks of each ability to your favorite colors!

Diverse Fighting Styles

Each run is different! Every character was designed to have unique combat styles that you can control based on loot and your choice of talents (120+ talents per character)! Want to turn your glass cannon Ice mage into a frosty tank? The choice is yours!

Fight An Eternal Fight

At the end of the run, you’ll take on an undefeatable, unbeatable, undominable boss. See how long you can survive and if your build has what it takes to finally take down the big bad boss.

Collect Loot

Find loot from over a BILLION different rune combinations, allowing new passive skills and bonuses to influence your run! With 6 rarities, and a forge system that allows you to upgrade and reroll specific aspects of your runes, you can create the perfect setup for your chosen build.

Procedurally Generated Maps

Dodge a myriad of specialized enemy skills from fresh encounters that change from map to map. Staying true to the roguelike side of the game you will choose between randomized events on different worlds, randomized shrines with powerful boons that can change your run, and run-specific items to buy from merchants.

Quick Gameplay

Don't have a lot of time to spend on games? Or maybe you're just tired of 90 minute roguelike escapades. Don't worry. Each expedition into the corrupted worlds takes about 30 minutes. Still too busy? Just do one act and head back to base with your new loot.

11 Difficulties

As you loot and progress from one expedition to the next, you unlock new difficulties (up to 11 total). Higher difficulties not only make the expedition tougher, but they introduce new game mechanics to spice things up. Oh, and you get way better loot too!

name: Fallen Worlds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-4430
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-3970X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Challenge the immortal god alongside a colorful cast of heroes in this co-op action rogue-lite, where you'll battle endlessly across Fallen Worlds in hopes of one day destroying the God that took everything from you.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
